interests.title: Technology
interests.content: Technology is the center of everything. I love keeping up with the latest developments and learning new ways I can connect my passions with tech.

interests.title: Social Impact
interests.content: I am strongly motivated by meaningful work. Currently I am on the executive board for Impact Labs, an organization dedicated to uniting tech and social good.

interests.title: Film and Literature
interests.content: I majored in English just so I could spend time with books and movies. My favorite book is 'The Fall' by Albert Camus, and my favorite movie is Jurassic Park!
